Text: Last week nearly 50,000 General Motors workers went on strike to get what they see as their fair share of its profits and stop further layoffs.
Cause: get what they see as their fair share of its profits and stop further layoffs.
Effect: Last week nearly 50,000 General Motors workers went on strike
